Others: The article discusses the performance of Luke Weaver and Clay Holmes in the New York Yankees' Game 1 win against the Kansas City Royals in the ALDS on Oct. 5, 2024.
It highlights Holmes' playoff success, as he hasn't allowed a run in 9 ²/₃ postseason innings.
The article mentions that Holmes replaced Clay Holmes at the end of games and both came up huge in the game.
